meanings: (의견) opinion; (고집) insistence, assertion, (formal) contention; (논점) argument; (근거가 없는) claim, insist, assert (that), argue, (formal) contend (that); (근거 없이) claim

examples.korean: to test the truth or falsehood of her claims 발음듣기 그녀의 주장이 참인지 거짓인지 확인하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to test the truth or falsehood of her claims 발음

examples.korean: an allegation that he had been dishonest 발음듣기 그가 부정을 저질렀다는 주장 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an allegation that he had been dishonest 발음

examples.korean: He made out that he had been robbed. 발음듣기 그는 강도를 당했다고 주장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He made out that he had been robbed. 발음

examples.korean: The winning captain held the trophy in the air. 발음듣기 우승팀 주장이 트로피를 높이 들어 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The winning captain held the trophy in the air. 발음

examples.korean: The country claimed sovereignty over the island. 발음듣기 그 나라가 그 섬에 대한 주권을 주장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The country claimed sovereignty over the island. 발음
